content:
764 
 
    (xlvii)   NDA requires the two (2) 'O' level credit passes in Arts and 
Social  Science  subjects  from  Accounts, 
 Commerce, Government, Civic Education, Geography and 
History.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 (I)  ABU accepts Arabic  
    (ii)  PHC and ILORIN require Economics, Mathematics either 
Government or Geography or History.  
    (iii)  OAU requires English Language, Mathematics, Economics 
and Geography or Government.  
    (iv)  IBADAN - Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects  
    (v)  OOU -Mathematics and any one (1) of Economics,  
Geography, Government, History and Literature in English  
    (vi)  ABU, JOS, MAIDUGURI, PHC, EKSU and ESUTECH -  
Mathematics is not compulsory  
    (vii)  IMSU - same as Marketing  
    (viii)   ILORIN  requires  one  (1)  subject  from  Accounting,  
Commerce, Business Method, Geography Government and  
Statistics.  
    (ix)  AAU and BAYERO require any Social Science subject as the 
third (3rd) subject.  
    (x)  DELSU requires Social Science subject as the fourth (4th) 
subject.  
    (xi) EBSU and BENIN requires Mathematics, Economics and any 
other subject.  
(xii) BINGHAM also requires Geography and Accounting.  
(xiii) CUAB and AAUA require Mathematics, Economics and any 
other Social Science subject  
(xiv) SALEM and EKSU require Mathematics, Economics and one 
(1) other Social Science subject. SALEM for Criminology 
requires Government and any two (2) of Economics, 
Geography and Literature in English.  
(xv) LAGOS requires Mathematics, Economics and any Arts, 
Science or Social Science subjects but does not accept 
Commerce.  
(xvi) AUN Accepts any subject combination which includes 
Mathematics and any two (2) of Environmental Science, 
Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Literature in English, 
Government, History, Economics, Geography, Further
